# Deprecated keys favorites.dataSpace.title=Data # Live table additional keys favorites.default.actions_edit=Edit Default Favourites favorites.user.addCurrentPage=Add this page favorites.user.addCurrentPage.alreadyExists=Page already exists in favourites. favorites.user.addRemoveOperation.fail=Failed to update favourites. favorites.user.addCurrentPage.success=Page added to favourites. favorites.user.removeCurrentPage.success=Page removed from favourites. favorites.user.removeCurrentPage.doesntExist=The page is not in the list of favourites. favorites.user.actions_edit=Manage Favourites favorites.user.tools_access=Access Favourites favorites.user.updateProfile=Favorite pages updated. favorites.form.save_button_text=Save

# User profile favorites.userprofile.menu=My Favourites
# Help favorites.help.description=Welcome to the Favourites administration. To activate Favourites you need to either add the Favorites.Code.FavoritesPanel to your list of panels, or to add Favorites.Code.FavoritesMenu as an include in your Menu. Below you can edit the default list of Favourites.
# More option menu button favorites.moreOptions.add=Add to favourites favorites.moreOptions.remove=Remove from favourites
# Macro rendering.macro.favorites.name=Favourites rendering.macro.favorites.description=List all favorite pages of a user
